item.description:
Casual Friday Afternoon Walk

Start your weekend early or grab a dog on your lunch break and meet me for a leashed walk and training session on the Milford Bike Trail, which has just been extended into Hopkinton!

Noon meet-up time at the Dilla Street entrance!

Also, if you are interested in helping plan a fall pet photography event or help with our March fundraiser, please call me directly at (508) 380-8853 or email justcassie101@comcast.net.

Thanks, guys! Love to see some of you Friday!

Cassie Stock
President
New England Bully Breed Club
newenglandbullybreedclub.com
item.how_to_find_us: Beautiful red pit bull with a blue and gold bandana!
item.name: Casual Friday Walk on the Bike Trail
